contents.text: Welcome to Udemy, the global marketplace for learning and teaching online.
For learner support and course information, press 1.
To get help choosing a course or accessing your learning materials, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a course enrollment specialist.

navigationGoals: Help me pick and enroll in the right course for my schedule.
I need help choosing and enrolling in a career-transition course tailored to veterans.
I need assistance provisioning my account and enrolling in the Kubernetes Deep Dive course.
I need help enrolling in a course and accessing the lesson materials.
I need advice on choosing the right intermediate-level physics course to enroll in.

contents.text: For technical support with our learning platform, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: Resolve the technical error preventing me from accessing my course.
I’m having trouble accessing my Udemy courses—my login isn’t working and I need technical support.
My course videos are buffering and my progress isn’t syncing across devices.
I’m having trouble playing my course videos online and need technical assistance.
I’m having trouble playing the lecture videos in my current physics course on the platform.

contents.text: For instructor services and partnerships, press 2.
To learn how to become an instructor on Udemy, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our instructor outreach team.

navigationGoals: Explain how to set up an instructor account and start teaching.
I want information on how to become an instructor and launch my own Udemy course on leadership skills.
I want to register as an instructor and integrate my GitHub repo for automated course updates.
I’d like to learn how to register as an instructor and create my first course.
I want to learn how to create and publish my own physics course on Udemy.

contents.text: For technical assistance with your instructor account, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to instructor technical support.

navigationGoals: Fix the login issue with my instructor dashboard so I can upload content.
I’m experiencing issues with my instructor account setup and need technical assistance uploading my course content.
My Udemy CLI upload of SCORM content is failing with an authentication error.
I need technical help resolving issues with my instructor account settings.
I can’t upload my instructor profile or course materials to my instructor account.
